title: Pygmy Necklace
summaries: The Pygmy Necklace is a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) pre-Hardmode / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) post-Plantera accessory that provides the player with one additional minion slot. It is purchased from the Witch Doctor for 20 GC at night.

On the <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console version</linked> and <linked>Nintendo 3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked><linked> version</linked>, the player must have defeated Plantera and have the <linked>Pygmy Staff</linked> in their inventory in order for the <linked>Witch Doctor</linked> to sell the item.

statistics.Tooltip: Increases your max number of minions by 1
statistics.Buy: 20 GC
statistics.Sell: 4 GC
